nodes.text: Rodian Collector was a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. It depicted a green-skinned male Rodian with black eyes. The Rodian was encircled in the middle of the painting and was shown collecting artifacts of the Force, namely a Sith and Jedi holocron. Around the outside of the encircled Rodian were depictions of a holochess game table, a fish caught on a fishing line, and the Rodian from the painting's center doing battle with a rancor—a vicious beast native to the planet Dathomir.

Rodian Collector was a painting available to players in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, and was added to the game on November 1, 2007 with the Chapter 7: A Collection of Heroes update. It could be obtained by the player after finishing a small quest chain meant to familiarize them with the newly added "Collections" system, which allowed players to collect various sets of loot or interactive world objects, which would yield a reward when the entire set was collected. The painting could only be obtained during the release of Chapter 7, and was no longer available with the release of Chapter 8: The Nova Orion Crisis on January 15, 2008.
